description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis -Attract Abundance In Your Life With Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • 1. Abundance begins in your mind. This video course is designed to help you achieve more abundance and prosperity in your life.
  • What is abundance?
  • Abundance is much more than merely money or things. Abundance is in having good friends and in being a good friend. Abundance is a harmonious life, a happy home, creative work, a meaningful relationship, quiet inner peace and spiritual growth. Learn how by simply changing the programming in your mind you can attract abundance in your life and also be grateful to the abundance you already have in your life.
  • 2. How Self Hypnosis Can Help?
  • 1) Self hypnosis helps to connect with the deep sources of power and energy within you
  • 2) Self hypnosis helps change your limiting beliefs and thoughts
  • 3) Self hypnosis makes you more mentally alert
  • 4) Self Hypnosis helps you a great wave of relaxation refreshing your whole body
  • 5) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude
  • 6) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

This course is ideal for those who want to attract abundance of wealth , happiness and peace of mind in their life and want to be more successful and happy in their daily and professional life through positive mind programming.

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonus
title: Hypnosis -Attract  Abundance In Your Life With Self Hypnosis
